p: We also stained aortic sinus sections with LC3 to examine whether HDE induced autophagy in atherosclerotic lesions. The LC3 staining results indicated that autophagy levels were increased in the HDE group, compared with the vehicle group ( Fig. 4E). These results indicated that HDE had inhibitory effects on atherosclerotic plaque formation through increased autophagy activity in ApoE −/− mice.
